basics.name: Hoda Osama
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer | EX Microsoft
basics.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 17+ years of experience building scalable, high performance systems across insurance, e commerce, fintech, and enterprise platforms. Experienced in architecture, backend engineering, API development, cloud readiness, performance optimization, distributed systems, automation, CI CD, and secure API design. Former Microsoft Senior Support Engineer for Microsoft Graph API, contributed to 36% increase in client satisfaction. Research interests include AI, optimization, machine learning, and computer vision.

work.name: Social Development Bank (SDB)
work.summary: Build and optimize enterprise systems using .NET Core and SQL Server. Contribute to system design, performance enhancements, modernization initiatives, and API driven workflows.
highlights: Build and optimize enterprise systems using .NET Core, SQL Server, and modern architectural patterns
Integrate automation, analytics, and API driven workflows to improve system reliability
Contribute to system design, performance enhancements, and modernization initiatives
Collaborate with cross functional teams to deliver scalable and secure services

work.name: Microsoft
work.position: Senior Support Engineer | Microsoft Graph API
work.summary: Provided technical support for Microsoft Graph API, code investigations, troubleshooting complex issues, joined client meetings, and contributed to a 36% increase in client satisfaction surveys.
highlights: Provided technical support for Microsoft Graph API and handled complex troubleshooting
Joined client meetings to offer hands-on solutions and resolve critical problems
Closed a high volume of support tickets with consistently top results
Contributed to a 36% increase in client satisfaction surveys

Enhanced automation systems and build deploy pipelines (Jenkins, Bitbucket, GitHub)
